name: French Martini
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Chambord / Raspberry Liqueur'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh Pineapple Juice'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled Nick and Nora glass. Note: This cocktail calls for fresh pressed pineapple juice.
source unknown
notes: Sweeter side of 'martini', kind of like a raspberry grandma candy; does not hide the vodka taste.

name: Lemon Drop
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Citrus Vodka'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Fine Granulated Sugar'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}]
recipe:
Shake all ingredients vigorously in a cocktail shaker for 20 seconds (to help integrate the sugar) and strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass or Martini Glass. Cut a lemon twist over the glass to add additional oils and drop twist into the glass.

Optionally you can omit the sugar from the drink and rim the glass, but this can create a sticky mess and not integrate as well into the drink.
Home Cocktail Menu
notes: Flavor profile closely resembling that of a lemon drop candy.

name: Midori Sour
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Midori Melon Liqueur'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sour mix'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Lemon-Lime Soda'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Luxardo Maraschino Cherry'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients except for your soda to a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass over ice. Top with lemon-lime soda and optionally garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Optionally, to 'craft' this cocktail up a bit more, use a half ounce (15ml) egg white to give it a nice white foam with an off-dry finish.
source unknown
notes: A sweet candy melon with a acidic sour finish with a light carbonation.

name: Pearl Harbor
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Midori Melon Liqueur'}, {'amount': '150.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Rhubarb Bitters'}]
recipe:
Add ice to a lowball or highball, then add vodka over the ice followed by midori liqueur. Top with the pinepple juice and either stir it (for it to taste great) or leave it layered (to look great).

Want to add a more interesting twist? Add Fee Brothers Rhubarb Bitters for a great spring time flare.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Pineapple and melon flavor profile with a refreshing moderate sweetness

name: Sex on the Beach
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Peach Schnapps'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cranberry Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Chambord / Raspberry Liqueur'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake for 10 seconds. Strain over ice into a tall glass. For true 80's appeal, add cocktail parasole with a flagged cherry and orange. Or, just use an orange slice as your garnish.
source unknown
notes: Sweet up front and dry in the back, with some red lollipop flavor or watermelon jolly rancher.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Southern Comfort'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Bourbon Whiskey'}, {'amount': '105.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sloe Gin'}]
recipe:
Stir juice, southern comfort and bourbon together with ice until chilled and strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Float with sloe gin on top (it will sink) and serve.
source unknown
notes: Taste like freshly squeezed orange juice with a twang of southern comfort sweetness.

name: 3 Dots and a Dash
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Martinique Rhum / Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Falernum Syrup'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Allspice dram / liqueur'}, {'amount': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Luxardo Maraschino Cherry'}]
recipe:
Combine everything into a blender and blend at high speed for about 5 seconds. Pour into a tall glass and garnish with 3 cherries and a pineapple spear (can also stick the a blade of the pineapple in there). The three cherries are your three "dots" and the spear is the "dash."
Beachbum Berry's Sippin' Safari
garnish: Three Maraschino Cherries and a Pineapple Spear
notes: Distinct clove-forward flavor, allspice with a nice bite of sour lime and a finishing of warm rum and Martinique funkiness.

name: 5th & Adams
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ginger Simple Syrup'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': "Peychaud's Bitters"}]
recipe:
All add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds, strain into a chilled coupe glass. Or, double/triple the recipe and put it into a highball glass (because it's just too tasty not to do this).
Bestia: Italian Recipes Created in the Heart of L.A
notes: None

name: Ancient Mariner
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Jamaican rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Simple Syrup'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Allspice dram / liqueur'}]
recipe:
Build all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Dump contents of shaker into a chilled old fashioned glass, garnish and serve!

Bonus points? Score your lime wedge to make it look fancy.
Jeff Berry REMIXED
notes: Rich molasses notes, a mild to moderate sweetness of allspice and demerara. Refreshing and well balanced.

name: Aruba Ariba
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Banana liqueur'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coconut Rum'}, {'amount': '150.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fruit Punch'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a tall glass and garnish.
source unknown
notes: Light and fruity with coconut, pineapple, cherry and no alcohol kick

name: Bali Bali
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cognac / Brandy'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gin'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Falernum Syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake aggressively for 15 seconds and strain over crushed ice into a tiki glass.
Jeff Berry's REMIXED
notes: Funky rum flavor, classic juicy tiki with mild tart and sour finish

name: Banana Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ice'}, {'amount': '0.5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Banana'}]
recipe:
Cut and peal half a banana, add banana and all remaining ingredients into blender and blend for 10 seconds or until smooth.

Use your favorite rum for this drink, it makes a difference.
Beachbum Berry REMIXED
notes: A subtle banana flavor with the focused flavor of your rum breaking right through without being boozy.

name: Barrel o' Rum
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Rum'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '6', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Club Soda'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a tin with crushed ice and pulse/blend for 5 seconds (we prefer the Hamilton Beach 730C Classic DrinkMaster Drink Mixer). Dump contents into tiki mug or rum barrel if you have one (especially if it's the Mai Kai rum barrel).
Beachbum Berry's Taboo Table
notes: Sweet and smooth passion fruit tartness with a mild sour and a good balance of sweet flavor, doesn't feel like four ounces of alcohol. Like a passion fruit lemonade.

name: Beachcomber's Punch
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Apricot Brandy'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Pernod / Absinthe'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 5 seconds, pour into a champagne flute with additional crushed ice and garnish with mint. We suggest the "dash" of pernod / absinthe utilize about six drops.
Jeff Berry's REMIXED
notes: Fruity flavors of mild grapefruit, and citrus with a light sweet brown sugar molasses finish

name: Blue Hawaii
ingredients: [{'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blue Curacao'}, {'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sour mix'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake aggressively for 12 seconds, strain over crushed ice into a highball glass or hurricane glass. Optionally, blend the cocktail and dump into your glass instead.
source unknown
notes: Pineapple sweet and light sour finish, spirits are mostly hidden within the beverage

name: Blue Hawaiian
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blue Curacao'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coco Lopez - Cream of Coconut'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Luxardo Maraschino Cherry'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Pineapple Wedge'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to your cocktail shaker and give it a hard aggressive shake for 20 seconds. Strain over fresh ice into your highball glass, garnish with a pineapple and cherry.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Heavy cream with huge coconut flavor with a muted hidden rum.

name: Blueberry Mezcal Margarita
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Orange Bitters'}, {'amount': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Blueberries'}]
recipe:
Puree or Muddle blueberries with fresh lime juice and simple syrup, combine in shaker with bitters and mezcal and shake for 8 to 10 seconds. Dump directly into your old fashioned glass and serve.
source unknown
notes: A lightly sweet blueberry with a tart sour finish that lingers with smoke

name: Bocce Ball
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Amaretto'}, {'amount': '135.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'splash', 'name': 'Club Soda'}]
recipe:
Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass and stir to integrate. Top with club soda, garnish and serve.
source unknown
notes: Great almond and orange blend, fairly sweet with a

name: Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Salt'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients into your cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass or over ice into an old fashioned glass and enjoy. Optional garnish would include a lime twist.

We call for "rum", generically, because the daiquiri works with all your favorites from a light rum to an aged rum or even a Demerara rum.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Refreshing sour bite with a lingering lime flavor with an overall backbone of beautiful rum.

name: Demerara Dry Float
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Overproof Rum / 151'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Maraschino Liqueur'}, {'amount': '75.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients except the overproof rum together in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake aggressively for 15 seconds. Strain over ice into an old fashioned glass and carefully top (pour over the back of a spoon) with overproof rum.

We suggest an overproof dark rum such as LemonHart 151 for this drink; a clear overproof rum won't look as pretty.
Intoxica by Jeff Berry
notes: Sweet and Tart with a growing tangy bite that grows on you while also bringing a good sour citrus

name: Doctor Funk
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Pernod / Absinthe'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Grenadine'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Club Soda'}]
recipe:
Shake all ingredients except club soda with ice for 15 seconds. Dump shaker contents into pilsner glass, tiki mug or favorite drinking vessel. Top with club soda, add more ice if needed.
Intoxica by Jeff Berry
notes: Lemonade and Good & Plenty candy, a light and refreshing sour against black licorice

name: Frozen Mudslide
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coffee Liqueur'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Irish Cream'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vanilla Ice Cream'}]
recipe:
Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream (around 6 ounces) and remaining ingredients to a blender with ice and blend until smooth (roughly 10-15 seconds). Garnish your old fashioned glass with chocolate syrup swirls and pour into your glass.

Optionally add chocolate shavings and whipped cream.
source unknown
notes: Chocolate milk blended with a cafe latte, great after dinner or before dinner beverage in warm weather.

name: Gin & Jam
ingredients: [{'amount': '37.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gin'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Simple Syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cranberry Jam'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Mexican Mole Bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to your cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Double strain with a tea strainer into your chilled coupe glass and serve.
Montana's Trail House Restaurant - Brooklyn, NY
notes: Sweet up front, dry in the back with notes of juniper pairing with a fruity cranberry.

name: Gin & Orange Special
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'London Dry Gin'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orange Liqueur'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients over ice into a tall glass and serve. Simple! The key to the flavors of this cocktail is the use of fresh pressed orange juice, it just doesn't compare to bottled OJ.
source unknown
notes: A juicy flavorful citrus against a subtle gin that's easy to taste and a great pool side beverage. The gin does hide pretty well however.

name: Gin Gin Mule
ingredients: [{'amount': '52.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'London Dry Gin'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ginger Beer'}, {'amount': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Mint Leaves'}]
recipe:
Muddle simple syrup, lime juice, and 8 mint leaves in the bottom of your shaker tin. Add gin and top with ice, then shake for 15 seconds. Double strain (with tea strainer to remove any mint) over fresh ice in a tall glass. Top with ginger beer and garnish with a fresh new mint sprig. Server with a straw.
New York Cocktails: An Elegant Collection of over 100 Recipes Inspired by the Big Apple (City Cocktails)
notes: Minty sweetness with a hint of backend ginger flavor

name: Hawaiian Slammer
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Overproof Rum / 151'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Banana liqueur'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coconut Rum'}, {'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Grenadine'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake aggressively for 15 seconds, strain over ice into a tall hi-ball glass and add maraschino cherries on an umbrella. Serve.
source unknown
notes: Fruity, but also intense with flavorful coconut and banana, and a bit of a rum bite.

name: Hotel Nacional
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Apricot Brandy'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds aggressively (to build a nice pineapple foam). Strain into a chilled coupe glass and serve.

Alternatively this works great with a dark rum.
source unknown
notes: A bold rum flavor balanced against tropical pineapple and apricot, a floral slightly delicate sour

name: Hurricane
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Rum'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Grenadine'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into an iced Hurricane Glass or Hi-Ball. Garnish and serve.
source unknown
notes: A flavorful fruit blend with a tart profile and a mild sour bite.

name: Knickerbocker
ingredients: [{'amount': '75.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rum'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Orange Curaçao'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Raspberry Syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Add crushed ice to a rocks glass and strain drink over crushed ice. Add garnishes and serve.
The Spruce Eats
notes: A flavorful raspberry flavor with a mild sour bite and a bit of potency in the finish

name: Krakatoa
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aged Rum'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Apricot Brandy'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coffee Liqueur'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Falernum Syrup'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Use fresh ice, crushed ice or dump the old ice from your cocktail shaker into your highball glass and serve. Garnish with fresh fruit if you so desire. It's tiki, get crazy.
source unknown
notes: Coffee notes right up front, citrus to follow with mingling clove; a tropical coffee beverage with interesting flavors.

name: Luau
ingredients: [{'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aged Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Overproof Rum / 151'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orgeat / Almond syrup'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add contents to a cocktail shaker with ice (or crushed ice) and shake aggressively for ten seconds. You can either pour over fresh crushed ice or dump right into your tiki mug. Serve!
To impress, garnish with orchids and citrus and an umbrella.
Gerry Corcoran
notes: Rich and tangy flavor, floral and full of flavors and a bit of finishing bite.

name: Matador
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Tequila'}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over fresh ice into a highball glass and serve.
source unknown
notes: A salty pineapple-like flavor with simple base flavor profiles easily expanded on with spicy tequila infusions, etc.

name: Mayan Mule #2
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Chili Steeped Tequila'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ginger Beer'}]
recipe:
Rim glass with sugar, cinnamon and coco and set aside. Add all ingredients except ginger beer to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over ice into a highball glass and top with ginger beer.

Chili Steeped Tequila: Roast a habanero pepper or two, and peel of the skin once it crisps a bit. Take the skinless habanero and soak them in tequila (5-6 ounces or so) for 30 minutes. Use that for the tequila called for in this cocktail.

For rim: add demerara sugar, cinnamon and coco to a bowl and mix to integrate. Use that as your rim garnish. Wet the rim with lime juice.
source unknown
garnish: Cinnamon, Demerara Sugar and Coco rim
notes: Hot and spicy fire, chocolate, tequila, spice and acidity all wrapped in more spicy heat!

name: Mezcal Mai Tai
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Yellow Chartreuse'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orgeat / Almond syrup'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds and dump into a double old fashioned glass. If you want to stay traditional to the original Mai Tai, use half a spent lime as a garnish.
source unknown
notes: Citrus sour, salty smoke of mezcal with a tart almond finish.

name: Nacional Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Apricot Brandy'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Peach Bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients with ice into a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a lime wedge.
Hotel Nacional, Havana Cuba
notes: Warm rum and citrus with a hint of peach in the finish; great balance of sweet against sour.

name: Paloma
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blanco Tequila'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Grapefruit Soda'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Salt'}]
recipe:
Rim a highball with salt and add ice. Follow through with tequila, lime juice and top with your grapefruit soda. Some grapefruit soda may make your Paloma pink, others a tint of yellow.

More advanced / tequila lovers may reduce the grapefruit soda ratio to 4 ounces (120ml) to bring out more tequila notes.
source unknown
notes: Light and carbonated grapefruit with a hint of agave

name: Palomar
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blanco Tequila'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Campari'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Simple Syrup'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Serrano Cocktail Spice, By Drinks World'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass with ice and garnish with a lime wheel.
Boy Drinks World
notes: Margarita-like flavor with a spicy backend fire with a lingering yet mild bitter finish

name: Passion Cocktail
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blanco Tequila'}, {'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cranberry Juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orange Liqueur'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over ice into a collins glass and garnish with a lime wedge. Serve!
source unknown
notes: A refreshing drink with good tequila notes, a light tart and light sweet balance against sour.

name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}]
recipe:
Build all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds, strain into your coupe glass and serve.
Eric Scott
notes: Borders on the line of sour to super sour passion fruit tartness with lingering lime finish.

name: Pearl Diver
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aged Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gardenia Mix'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup crushed ice and blend on high for 20 seconds or until a nice rich foam appears. Strain (or dump if you are being lazy) into a tiki mug or Pearl Diver glass if you can find one. Top with crushed ice and garnish with an orchid and pineapple leaf. We also used an old fashioned glass because it was simple.
Beachbum Berry's Sippin' Safari
notes: Coconut, allspice, nutmeg, citrus and a bit of rich rum greets your senses with every sip

name: Pearl Harbor
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Midori Melon Liqueur'}, {'amount': '150.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Rhubarb Bitters'}]
recipe:
Add ice to a lowball or highball, then add vodka over the ice followed by midori liqueur. Top with the pinepple juice and either stir it (for it to taste great) or leave it layered (to look great).

Want to add a more interesting twist? Add Fee Brothers Rhubarb Bitters for a great spring time flare.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Pineapple and melon flavor profile with a refreshing moderate sweetness

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coco Lopez - Cream of Coconut'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Heavy Cream'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Luxardo Maraschino Cherry'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 10 to 15 seconds. Optionally, add a maraschino cherry garnish if you'd like!
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Sweet coconut and that's about it. But oh so good.

name: Pusser's Painkiller ™
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': "Pusser's Rum"}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coco Lopez - Cream of Coconut'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over fresh ice into an old fashioned glass and garnish with a liberal amount of nutmeg.
Daphne Henderson
notes: Smooth mouthfeel like that of a blended drink, with coconut dominating, rum on the back end and a lovely nutmeg aromatic, on the sweeter side. Not too unlike a pina colada.

name: Rum Flower
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Elderflower Liqueur'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Raspberry Syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Jennifer Schommer
notes: A balance of elderflower and raspberry, slightly on the fruity/sweeter side with rich molasses, brown sugar notes and a full acidic structure.

name: Rye Tai
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rye Whiskey'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orgeat / Almond syrup'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '10', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake with ice for 15 seconds, strain into an ice filled old fashioned glass and serve. If you want to add some garnish flare, hold your bitters out of the recipe until the end and dash them all on top of the drink to give a white/dark contrasting look!
Nick Brown, The Spaniard, New York City
notes: Almond, cinnamon, trade spices and a finish of lightly sweet rye whiskey

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Southern Comfort'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Bourbon Whiskey'}, {'amount': '105.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sloe Gin'}]
recipe:
Stir juice, southern comfort and bourbon together with ice until chilled and strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Float with sloe gin on top (it will sink) and serve.
source unknown
notes: Taste like freshly squeezed orange juice with a twang of southern comfort sweetness.

name: Social Season
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gin'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aperol'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Yellow Chartreuse'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake it for 12 seconds, strain it over crushed ice, then add a bit of crushed ice on the top.
Boston Tiki Party
notes: A light bitter aperol, a flavorful sweet passion fruit, light tart, lots of flavors going on

name: Steve's Rum Barrel
ingredients: [{'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Jamaican rum'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Pernod / Absinthe'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Almond Extract'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to an immersion blender with crushed ice, dump into a tiki mug. For Pernod (Absinthe) do 6 drops (roughly 1 dash), for almond extract, do 3 drops (or around that, maybe a dash)
Jeff Berry's REMIXED
notes: A bit strong on potency, a mild bitter, not too sweet, not too sour, lots of tropical flavor with a light honey finish

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rich simple syrup'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Strawberries'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a blender and add six cubes of ice (or around 8 ounces / 1 cup) and blend for 10-15 seconds or until smooth.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Sweet strawberries and a light sour lime with a cold refreshing taste.

name: Suffering Bastard
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gin'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Brandy / Cognac'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ginger Beer'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients except ginger beer to a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Slowly stir ginger beer into your cocktail shaker to integrate. Then dump entire contents of your cocktail shaker into a double old fashioned glass.

Garnish with mint sprig and orange slice.
Jeff Berry REMIXED
notes: Light and refreshing zing of ginger with mellow island spice and muted alcohols.

name: Test Pilot
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Jamaican rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Falernum Syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cointreau'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Pernod / Absinthe'}]
recipe:
Build in a mixing glass or blender with crushed ice, and blend for 5 seconds (or give it a good shake). Dump (do not strain) into a double old fashioned glass and stack with ice, and a cherry. For absinthe, we suggest a dash that's "6 drops" (from a dropper or 2 sprays from an atomizer)
Jeff Berry's REMIXED
notes: Mild sour, light on sweet, funky jamaican rum forward flavor

name: The Batanga
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Tequila'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': 'null', 'unit': 'null', 'name': 'Coca Cola'}]
recipe:
Build in a highball / collins glass, add ice and follow it with lime juice, tequila and top with Coca Cola. We prefer Mexican Coca Cola as it does not contain super sweet high fructose corn syrup.

If the acidity is too high, dial back your lime juice to a quarter ounce (or just a lime quarter squeeze and drop in).
Don Javier Delgado
notes: Lightly sweet soda, a healthy bite of lime acidity, bright tequila with muted saline notes.

name: The Polynesian Spell
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gin'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Grape Juice'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Triple sec'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Peach Schnapps'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds and strain over fresh ice into a lowball glass.
source unknown
notes: Grape Daiquiri Popsicle with a sour bite in the finish, like a sweet tart

name: The White Walker
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aged Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cinnamon syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake aggressively before dumping contents into a highball glass or pilsner class (if you make multiple batches). Top with crushed ice and garnish with your favorite tropical fruits and/or pineapple leaves.
Dan Rook, South Water Kitchen, Chicago
notes: Flavorful pineapple and light cinnamon notes playing off the quality of your rums

name: Watermelon Thai Basil Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Watermelon Thai Basil Syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass, garnish and serve. Optionally garnish with a lime wedge.

name: What The Dickens?
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cognac / Brandy'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': "Peychaud's Bitters"}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]

Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice, shake for 15 seconds and strain over ice, garnish with a lime wheel.
Imbibe Magazine

name: Whiskey Smash
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Bourbon Whiskey'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Mint Leaves'}, {'amount': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Lemon Wedges'}]
recipe:
Cut a half lemon into wedges. In a shaker, muddle the lemon with the simple syrup. Add mint leave and perform a more gentle muddle. Add the remaining ingredients with ice and shake. Dump ice and ingredients into a double old fashioned and add more ice as necessary.
source unknown
notes: Warm buttery oak, citrus, mint, light touch of vanilla notes in the finish. Whiskey brand dictates profile.

name: Michelada
ingredients: [{'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Hot sauce'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Black pepper'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Celery salt'}, {'amount': '480.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mexican Lager'}]
recipe:
Rim your pint glass with a 50/50 blend of cayenne pepper and salt. Add each of the ingredients into your pint glass and top with a bottle of Mexican lager. Add a lime wedge to finish your garnish.
source unknown
garnish: cayenne pepper / salt rim & lime wedge
notes: Hot and spicy Mexican lager

name: Age of Aquarius
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Campari'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients except Campari to your shaker tin with ice, and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over crushed ice into an old fashioned glass. Float Campari on top, roughly one-fifth of an ounce or around a bar spoon.
Devojka
notes: Starts sweet, moves to sour and tart with tail end of smokey and bitter yet mildly sweet.

name: Americano
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Campari'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sweet Vermouth'}, {'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Club Soda'}]
recipe:
Add each ingredient over ice into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.
source unknown

name: Aperol Spritz
ingredients: [{'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Prosecco'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aperol'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Club Soda'}]
recipe:
Add ice to a wine / champagne glass and follow that up with Prosecco. Add Aperol and club soda and follow that up with your garnish and serve.

name: Apple Jack Cocktail
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Apple Brandy'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orange Curaçao'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Orange Bitters'}]

name: Bamboo Screwdriver
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orange Liqueur'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '4', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 second. Strain over ice into an old fashioned glass.

name: Bashful Canadian

recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake aggressively for 15 seconds. Strain contents into a chilled coupe glass or Nick & Nora glass and serve.

We suggest a high proof rye for this cocktail, like 100 Proof Knob Creek.

name: Bensonhurst
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rye Whiskey'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dry Vermouth'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'barspoons', 'name': 'Maraschino Liqueur'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Cynar'}]

Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir for about 2 minutes. Strain into a chilled glass and serve.
source unknown

name: Civil War

recipe:

name: Cynar Flip
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Canadian Whiskey'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cynar'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cointreau'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Clove Simple Syrup'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Whole Egg'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Bittertruth Jerry Thomas Bitters'}]

name: Division Bell
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aperol'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Maraschino Liqueur'}]

name: Emerald Cocktail

recipe:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled (usually around 2 minutes). Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Using an orange zest, twist zest to extract oils over drink and rub it along the rim of your glass and drop into the drink.

We received a bit of our bitterness in the taste profile from our use of Carpano Antica Vermouth--while this drink doesn't call for it specifically it brings interesting flavor to the design.

name: Flawless Victory

recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over ice into an old fashioned glass, garnish and serve.

name: Gin Campari Sour

recipe:

name: Jeez Louis

Build over ice in a double old fashioned glass and garnish with half a wheel of orange.
source unknown
notes: Very bitter cocktail with a strong alcohol-forward flavor profile. A lingering bitter bite.

name: Palomar
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blanco Tequila'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Campari'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Simple Syrup'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Serrano Cocktail Spice, By Drinks World'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass with ice and garnish with a lime wheel.
Boy Drinks World
notes: Margarita-like flavor with a spicy backend fire with a lingering yet mild bitter finish

name: Paper Plane
ingredients: [{'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Bourbon Whiskey'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aperol'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Amaro Nonino'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}]
recipe:
Add all your ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a paper plane.
Amaro Nonino
notes: a rollercoaster ride of flavor, a sweet start, a grapefruit mid-plate with a bitter bite that focuses on aperol and amaro nonino with little bourbon and an off-dry finish.

name: Red Hook
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rye Whiskey'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Punt e Mes Italian Vermouth'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Maraschino Liqueur'}]
recipe:
Stir all ingredients in mixing glass for 2 minutes (30 seconds for the impatient) and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Milk and Honey Bar - NYC
notes: A spicy manhattan with similar sweetness and the herbaceous maraschino flavor and muted bitterness; alcohol-forward flavor of rye.

name: Sin Cyn
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Single Malt Scotch (12 Year)'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cynar'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Carpano Antica Sweet Vermouth'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir until chilled (roughly 2 minutes is usually best). Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with an orange twist. Serve.
Red Owl Tavern in Philadelphia
notes: A light bitter orange start, light eucalyptus herbal note, with a mild well-balanced scotch against the herbaceousness

name: Smoke Show
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cynar'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Green Chartreuse'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Egg White'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients, including egg white, into a cocktail shaker without ice. Dry shake aggressively for 15 seconds then add your ice and give it another 10 second shake. Strain into a chilled coupe and serve.
Liz Martinez
notes: A dry citrus flavor, a good blend of smoke and sour that lingers; a slight hint of herbal bitterness in the mid-palate.

name: Sundowner
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Campari'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Chocolate Bitters'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Cointreau'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over fresh ice into your old fashioned glass and garnish with an orange slice.
source unknown
notes: Smokey mezcal up front, bitter in the back with a little tequila sunrise like flavor profile.

name: Tequiliano
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Tequila'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Campari'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sweet Vermouth'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Agave nectar'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients over ice into an old fashioned glass and give drink a quick stir and garnish with an orange slice.
Eddy Buckingham's Bar
notes: Tequila, mild sweetness and lingering bitter bite

name: The Long Goodbye
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Cynar'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Mezcal'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rich simple syrup'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Soda Water'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients except soda water to a cocktail shaker and shake it for 15 seconds. Double strain over fresh ice into a collins glass and top with soda water (roughly 1 oz). Add a straw, give a quick stir, and serve. Add a lime for garnish.
Heather Sang, Clyde Common , Portland, Oregon.
notes: Dry citrus zing with a bitter bite and a lingering smoke.

name: The Siesta
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Blanco Tequila'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Campari'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh grapefruit juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients over ice into a cocktail shaker and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass and serve.
source unknown
notes: A salty campari mild bitterness, tequila from start to finish with a tart dry finish.

name: Trinidad Sour
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Orgeat / Almond syrup'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rye Whiskey'}]
recipe:
Chill a large coupe glass with water and ice; set aside.

Add cocktail ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Dump ice and water from your glass and strain contents of the shaker into your chilled glass.

If you fall in love with a Trinidad sour, we suggest a 16 oz bottle of angostura bitters as you'll be going through bitters quickly.
Home Cocktail Menu
notes: Bitter clove, allspice, nutmeg and other trade spices with just the right amount of balance

name: 3 Dots and a Dash
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Martinique Rhum / Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Falernum Syrup'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Allspice dram / liqueur'}, {'amount': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Luxardo Maraschino Cherry'}]
recipe:
Combine everything into a blender and blend at high speed for about 5 seconds. Pour into a tall glass and garnish with 3 cherries and a pineapple spear (can also stick the a blade of the pineapple in there). The three cherries are your three "dots" and the spear is the "dash."
Beachbum Berry's Sippin' Safari
garnish: Three Maraschino Cherries and a Pineapple Spear
notes: Distinct clove-forward flavor, allspice with a nice bite of sour lime and a finishing of warm rum and Martinique funkiness.

name: Banana Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Puerto Rican Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ice'}, {'amount': '0.5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Banana'}]
recipe:
Cut and peal half a banana, add banana and all remaining ingredients into blender and blend for 10 seconds or until smooth.

Use your favorite rum for this drink, it makes a difference.
Beachbum Berry REMIXED
notes: A subtle banana flavor with the focused flavor of your rum breaking right through without being boozy.

name: Frozen Mudslide
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coffee Liqueur'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Irish Cream'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vanilla Ice Cream'}]
recipe:
Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream (around 6 ounces) and remaining ingredients to a blender with ice and blend until smooth (roughly 10-15 seconds). Garnish your old fashioned glass with chocolate syrup swirls and pour into your glass.

Optionally add chocolate shavings and whipped cream.
source unknown
notes: Chocolate milk blended with a cafe latte, great after dinner or before dinner beverage in warm weather.

name: Miami Vice
ingredients: [{'amount': '150.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pina Colada'}, {'amount': '150.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Strawberry Daiquiri'}]
recipe:
Create both a Piña colada and the Strawberry Daiquiri separately. Then, pour your pina colada into a glass and stack the strawberry daiquiri on top. Stir a bit to look cool and serve.

Stack in a highball glass or hurricane glass if you have one available.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: The perfect balance of strawberry and coconut in a single glass.

name: Pearl Diver
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aged Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Demerara Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gardenia Mix'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add all the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup crushed ice and blend on high for 20 seconds or until a nice rich foam appears. Strain (or dump if you are being lazy) into a tiki mug or Pearl Diver glass if you can find one. Top with crushed ice and garnish with an orchid and pineapple leaf. We also used an old fashioned glass because it was simple.
Beachbum Berry's Sippin' Safari
notes: Coconut, allspice, nutmeg, citrus and a bit of rich rum greets your senses with every sip

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coco Lopez - Cream of Coconut'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Heavy Cream'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Pineapple Juice'}, {'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ice'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Luxardo Maraschino Cherry'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 10 to 15 seconds. Optionally, add a maraschino cherry garnish if you'd like!
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Sweet coconut and that's about it. But oh so good.

name: Port Light
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Bourbon Whiskey'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Passion fruit syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Grenadine'}, {'amount': '240.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Ice'}]
recipe:
Build in blender with crushed ice, blend 5 seconds, dump into old fashioned glass and top with more crushed ice.
Beachbum Berry Remixed, A Gallery of Tiki Drinks
garnish: Garnish with bamboo pick with a bourbon cherry hanging off.
notes: flavorful and yummies

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rum'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Rich simple syrup'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Strawberries'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a blender and add six cubes of ice (or around 8 ounces / 1 cup) and blend for 10-15 seconds or until smooth.
Common Man Cocktails
notes: Sweet strawberries and a light sour lime with a cold refreshing taste.

name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Vodka'}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Tomato Juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Horseradish'}, {'amount': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'amount': '4', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Tabasco sauce'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Salt'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Black pepper'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': "Scrappy's Firewater Tincture"}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Celery bitters'}]
recipe:
Build all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake for 10 seconds and strain over fresh ice into a tall glass. Garnish with celery stick and anything else you would love to see on top of your Bloody Mary.

Celery Bitters and Firewater Bitters optional ingredients that bring savory heat to your recipe.
Home Cocktail Menu
notes: Savory flavor of tomato, salt, spice and citrus with a bit of pepper

name: Irish Coffee
ingredients: [{'amount': '240.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Coffee'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Brown Sugar'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Irish Whiskey'}]
recipe:
Fill mug with hot water to preheat it, then empty. Pour hot coffee into the warm glass to about 3/4 full and then stir in brown sugar until dissolved. Add your Irish Whiskey of choice, and top with whipped cream. Serve hot.
source unknown
notes: Coffee, with a mild irish whiskey, with a modest bitterness

name: Mimosa
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '120.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Brut Champagne'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'barspoon', 'name': 'Grand Marnier'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'Orange Bitters'}]
recipe:
Add orange juice to your glass and top with champagne. Optionally, add a little bit of orange bitters and a bit of grand mariner for a great citrus experience.

Note: if you really love champagne cocktails, you may opt to add double the champagne listed in the ingredients.
source unknown
notes: A light and refreshing dry champagne and citrus experience.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Southern Comfort'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Bourbon Whiskey'}, {'amount': '105.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Sloe Gin'}]
recipe:
Stir juice, southern comfort and bourbon together with ice until chilled and strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Float with sloe gin on top (it will sink) and serve.
source unknown
notes: Taste like freshly squeezed orange juice with a twang of southern comfort sweetness.

name: Spiked Eggnog
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Dark Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Brandy / Cognac'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Heavy Cream'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Whole Egg'}]
recipe:
Chill your old fashioned glass with ice and water. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker without ice and aggressively shake for 15 seconds. Add ice to your cocktail shaker and shake for another 15 seconds.

Dump your ice and water from your glass and strain contents of shaker into a chilled glass. Garnish and serve.
source unknown
notes: Creamy eggnog with a lightly burning alcohol, lightly sweet balanced against a rum finish. A bit chalky aftertaste.

name: Vampiro
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Reposado Tequila'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Tomato Juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh orange juice'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Grenadine'}, {'amount': '7', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Hot sauce'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Salt'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Black pepper'}]
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain over fresh ice into an old fashioned glass.

The original design was a combination of tequila and a homemade sangrita, however the use of orange juice with tomato juice and spices in this cocktail recipe bring those together in the build itself.

For hot sauce, one may choose Cholula as it is a Mexican hot sauce or something spicier.
source unknown
notes: Tequila meets tomato juice which quickly bounces into a sweet tomato orange flavor profile and ends with a spicy kick.

name: Air Mail
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Light Rum'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Honey Syrup / Mix'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lime juice'}, {'amount': 'null', 'unit': 'null', 'name': 'Champagne / Sparkling Wine'}]
recipe:
Build all ingredients except champagne in a cocktail shaker with ice, give it a healthy 10 second shake. Strain into a coupe or Nick & Nora glass and top with champagne (at least 1.5 oz). Historically garnished with a postage stamp, probably can be skipped for this one. If possible, use a light cuban rum.

name: Aperol Spritz
ingredients: [{'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Prosecco'}, {'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Aperol'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Club Soda'}]
recipe:
Add ice to a wine / champagne glass and follow that up with Prosecco. Add Aperol and club soda and follow that up with your garnish and serve.

name: Champagne Cocktail
ingredients: [{'amount': '180.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Champagne / Sparkling Wine'}, {'amount': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}, {'amount': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Sugar Cube'}]
recipe:
Add dashes of bitters to your sugar cube and place in the bottom of a champagne glass. Pour champagne/prosecco/sparkling wine into your wine glass.

name: Disaronno Wears Cavalli Sour
ingredients: [{'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Disaronno Originale Amaretto'}, {'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '45.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Prosecco'}, {'amount': '10', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Angostura bitters'}]
recipe:
Add lemon juice, simple syrup and disaronno to a cocktail shaker and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and top with Prosecco. Float 10 dashes of bitters on top and garnish.
Disaronno
notes: Sweet flavor of disaronno meets prosecco with a beautiful trade spice profile of bitters.

name: French 75
ingredients: [{'amount': '30.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'London Dry Gin'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Simple syrup'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '90.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Champagne / Sparkling Wine'}]
recipe:
Shake all ingredients (except Champagne) vigorously in a cocktail shaker for 10 seconds and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon twist, serve.

recipe:

recipe:

name: Aviation
ingredients: [{'amount': '60.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Gin'}, {'amount': '22.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Fresh lemon juice'}, {'amount': '15.0', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Maraschino Liqueur'}, {'amount': '7.5', 'unit': 'ml', 'name': 'Creme de Violette'}]

recipe:

To fashion yourself some honey syrup, we suggest adding 1-part water to 1-part honey (clover honey if you have it) and stir them to dilute. If your honey is very thick or hard, heat your water first to help soften the honey in the mix. Or, just buy a bottle of pre-made honey mix.
